name: Mario Diaz-Balart
tweet_text:
(2/2) An example would be: A community hospital billed Medicare FFS $121 million in 2019. To determine how much they would receive, use this equation: 

✔️$121,000,000/$484,000,000,000 x $30,000,000,000 = $7,500,000

name: Mario Diaz-Balart
tweet_text:
(1/3) To calculate how Provider Relief Funding distributions are determined, health care providers can: 

Divide their 2019 Medicare FFS (not including Medicare Advantage) payments they received by $484B and multiply that ratio by $30B.
